translateAbout(MouseEvent) - Method in class controllers.SceneControllerDashboard
This code handles a mouse event and triggers a transition animation for a node called "sliderAbout."
translateAdd(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.SceneControllerActivities
This method is used to slide the "sliderAdd" element horizontally by a distance of 285 pixels (when "postionAddSlider" is 0) or -285 pixels (when "postionAddSlider" is 1) using a TranslateTransition animation.

translateModify(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.SceneControllerActivities
This function is called "translateModify" and it animates the movement of an element called "sliderModify" by sliding it horizontally by a certain distance (285 pixels) over a certain duration (1000 milliseconds).
